choices.answer: Home ventilation system
Car
Big-as TV
Taxi service

questions.question: Lenders must make their interest rates, fees and terms publicly available

choices.answer: to show how friendly they are
the law says they must, to help borrowers choose a good deal
in case you're not great at maths
to show how knowledgeable they are

questions.question: When choosing a loan, make sure you

choices.answer: talk to your friends first
choose the first offer before it disappears
choose the offer that comes with a free gift
research and shop around for the offer that best suits you

questions.question: Why do lenders ask people questions about the money they want to borrow?

choices.answer: To show how friendly they are
Because they're nosey
To make sure you can afford the loan
They want to offer you as expensive a loan as possible

questions.question: What information do you need to give lenders?

choices.answer: The size of your house
Which sports team you support
Information showing you can afford the loan
Your hobbies
an essential household item needs replacing
you want to go to Fiji but haven't got any savings
you feel like a treat
your friend has asked to borrow some money from you

questions.question: What would a lender want to know about you?

choices.answer: What kind of pet you have
How much you earn, and any other loans you have
What loans your friends have
How many brothers and sisters you have

questions.question: When thinking about getting a loan, you need to know about

choices.answer: how nice the lender is
the latest model of the good you want to buy
the lender's opening hours
your rights and obligations, and how much it will cost you

questions.question: You should only get a loan if

choices.answer: you can afford to pay it back
you want to update to a later model car
you really want a trip to Fiji and need a loan to pay for it
your friend has the same loan

questions.question: A useful website about your rights when getting a loan is

choices.answer: City Council
Loan Sharks R Us
Facebook
Commerce Commission
